resources.string: Hello All! I am Jason Worrell, I have been enlisted in the United States Air Force for the last 21 years. This has taken me to many places and introduced me to many people and ideas. In this app you will find I have told a little bit about my self and the kinds of movies that I enjoy watching. I hope this list finds you well and that you enjoy some of thes films as much as I have.

A young female hacker awakens from a traumatic event that she scarcely remembers, and an iPhone glued to her hand. On the phone, a countdown is ticking away to zero. What happens at zero? Who is she, and why has she become an extension of the device? As the minutes tick away, our heroine must race against time to put the pieces together before the mysterious, pending zero-hour strikes
